::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod watches the Pred's escape.
"Ha, don't come back!"
He then sees a streak in the sky. (The Decepticon ship, with Hell Beast
and co.)
"What do you think that was?" Hot Rod says, walking in to the ship, and
in to a CR chamber.
